data.name: 0000 (200.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh yeah, how was the report?

data.name: 0001 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Report? What report?

data.name: 0002 (200.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The report Koizumi wrote about his findings.

data.name: 0003 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh, that.

data.name: 0004 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's what you'd expect from Koizumi--it was a concisely collected and easy to understand.

data.name: 0005 (200.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm asking about its contents, not Koizumi's distinguished service.

data.name: 0006 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The Computer Society's expenses, budget, their purchase history--that kind of thing.

data.name: 0007 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you're interested, I can show you later. Make sure you take it all to heart.

data.name: 0008 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You only ever rely on others anyway. You're lacking any spontaneous proactivity!

data.name: 0009 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We can have a thorough discussion about this in our post-camp review meeting.

data.name: 0010 (200.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Once again--I wish I kept my mouth shut…

data.name: 0011 (200.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, I heart from Kyon… About Koizumi's report.

data.name: 0012 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The report with things like the Computer Society's budget and purchase history?

data.name: 0013 (200.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, that report. Were you able to draw any leads from it?

data.name: 0014 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Let's see... I couldn't have made certain inferences without it, but more importantly…

data.name: 0015 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: While Koizumi worked hard to create a report, Kyon was slacking off.

data.name: 0016 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If only he'd learn from Koizumi's brilliant example.

data.name: 0017 (200.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I think Kyon is also trying his best…

data.name: 0018 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't be naive, Mikuru. Kyon has absolutely no desire to do anything at all.

data.name: 0019 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You mustn't go easy on him, you know--as a member of the SOS Brigade?

data.name: 0020 (200.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay... I'll be careful...

data.name: 0021 (200.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Have you read this?

data.name: 0022 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What? Ah, Koizumi's report? Of course I've read it.

data.name: 0023 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You've read it too? What did you think?

data.name: 0024 (200.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Simple.

data.name: 0025 (200.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: But the points were easy to grasp.

data.name: 0026 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I feel the same way. That's our Koizumi.

data.name: 0027 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The important points were so precisely encapsulated and easy to understand.

data.name: 0028 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And despite that, Kyon meanwhile was being of no use to anyone.

data.name: 0029 (200.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Really?

data.name: 0030 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You would certainly understand if you were there.

data.name: 0031 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, we can talk about the report as we walk. Let's hurry.

data.name: 0033 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Goodness me, I accidentally forgot to ask you--

data.name: 0034 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What did you think about the report about those materials?

data.name: 0035 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You mean the report you wrote on the Computer Society's budget and stuff?

data.name: 0036 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, the report I created under your discretion.

data.name: 0037 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was perfect. The important points were put together well, and it was easy to understand.

data.name: 0038 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thank you very much. It's an honor that I was able to be of use.

data.name: 0039 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If only Kyon followed your example a little. Good grief.

data.name: 0040 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: He has his own ways... rather, I'm sure he's working harder than any of us.

data.name: 0041 (200.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon working hard? What are you talking about?

data.name: 0042 (200.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Ah, pay me no notice, it's just a feeling I had.
